search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for BoothBook (boothbook.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for BoothBook is: [https://manage.boothbook.com/boothbook-pricing](https://manage.boothbook.com/boothbook-pricing) 【3:0†source】.

Work Smarter, Not Harder  
It's time to say goodbye to admin, forever.

Did you know we offer a free unlimited trial?  
No credit card. No contract. Cancel anytime.

[See Pricing](https://manage.boothbook.com/work-smarter-not-harder#pricing-table)[How Much Can I Save?](https://manage.boothbook.com/calculator)

It's a great tool that's easy to use. It simplifies my life, earns me money while I sleep, and allows me do other things whilst all my admin is taken care of. I love it! It looks professional on my website and customers love how streamlined it is.

![Image 2: BoothBook Review Liverpool Selfie Mirror](https://manage.boothbook.com/sites/default/files/styles/thumbnail/public/Paul_0.png?itok=CwiG__am)

Liverpool Selfie Mirror

![Image 3](https://manage.boothbook.com/sites/all/themes/boothbook/images/checked-blu.png)

Save

------------

A Plan To Suit Any Business
===========================

Complete business management for only...
----------------------------------------

### £23.99

/month [Approx $30 (USD)](https://www.google.co.uk/search?q=23.99+GBP+to+USD) [Start Free Trial](https://manage.boothbook.com/setup?link=1) [Need More Power?](https://manage.boothbook.com/work-smarter-not-harder#packages)

*   [![Image 6: Online Bookings](https://manage.boothbook.com/sites/all/themes/boothbook/images/checked-ora.png)Online BookingCustomers can book directly from your website or Facebook page](https://manage.boothbook.com/explore/take-automatic-bookings-your-sleep)
*   [![Image 7: Capture Leads](https://manage.boothbook.com/sites/all/themes/boothbook/images/checked-ora.png)Lead ManagementTrack prospects from your contact form to a paying customer](https://manage.boothbook.com/explore/capture-new-business-opportunities)
*   [![Image 8: Online Contracts](https://manage.boothbook.com/sites/all/themes/boothbook/images/checked-ora.png)Contract SigningSeal the deal at the time of booking with smart dynamic E-Contracts](https://manage.boothbook.com/explore/maintain-professionalism-contracts)
*   [![Image 9: Send Proposals](https://manage.boothbook.com/sites/all/themes/boothbook/images/checked-ora.png)Microsite ProposalsCreate 1 page interactive proposals to win business](https://manage.boothbook.com/explore/close-leads-stunning-proposals)
*   [![Image 10: Manage Staff](https://manage.boothbook.com/sites/all/themes/boothbook/images/checked-ora.png)Staff ManagementManage availability and event assignment for up to 5 staff](https://manage.boothbook.com/explore/organise-your-staff)
*   [![Image 11: Unlimited Booths, Units, Packages and Extras](https://manage.boothbook.com/sites/all/themes/boothbook/images/checked-ora.png)Unlimited InventoryTrack assets accordingly and never double book an event](https://manage.boothbook.com/explore/increase-efficiency-productivity)
*   [![Image 12: Scheduled Automatic Notifications](https://manage.boothbook.com/sites/all/themes/boothbook/images/checked-ora.png)AutomationsSchedule automatic E-mail, SMS and more](https://manage.boothbook.com/explore/automations-boothbook)
*   [![Image 13: Questionnaires & Webforms](https://manage.boothbook.com/sites/all/themes/boothbook/images/checked-ora.png)WebformsCapture additional event data](https://manage.boothbook.com/explore/photobooth-and-dj-questionnaires-webforms)
*   [![Image 14: Online Galleries](https://manage.boothbook.com/sites/all/themes/boothbook/images/checked-ora.png)Online GalleriesAutomatically turn your Dropbox, Google Drive & One Drive Folders into online galleries](https://manage.boothbook.com/explore/boothbook-and-boothgallery)
*   [![Image 15: Manage Tasks](https://manage.boothbook.com/sites/all/themes/boothbook/images/checked-ora.png)Task ManagementKeep on top of your to-do lists and assign tasks to your team](https://manage.boothbook.com/explore/manage-daily-operations-tasks)
*   ![Image 16: 24/7 Support](https://manage.boothbook.com/sites/all/themes/boothbook/images/checked-ora.png)24/7 SupportRaise tickets from your account or book in a phone call

Need More Power?
----------------

All of our plans are built to grow with you

Allow BoothBook to handle more of your workload and automate more of your tasks by choosing one of our high level plans.

Newbie

*   24/7 High PriorityTicket Support
*   Mon-Fri Phone Support
*   QuarterlyBusiness Audit
*   PersonalAccount Rep
*   VIPTraining Webinars
*   VIPGroup Access

**PLUS** 100's of additional tools to grow your business

[Discover All Features](https://manage.boothbook.com/all-features)

Non-UK Customers
----------------

Prices are charged in UK GBP, your country's exchange rates may vary slightly month by month, this will be reflected on your monthly bill

UK Customers
------------

Prices shown exclude VAT for UK customers

Trial Period
------------

Your BoothBook Trial is unlimited, however, if there is inactivity on your account for an extended period of time, we will contact you to confirm if you wish to proceed with the trial

No Contract Period
------------------

There is no minimum contract period, BoothBook is a pay-as-you-go monthly service, you will be billed monthly for the month ahead, and have the right to cancel whenever you need to

No Set Up Fees
--------------

BoothBook offers free set up to all users, each member has a dedicated installation, with their own bandwidth and storage

No Booking Fees
---------------

BoothBook does not charge a fee per booking, and never takes a percentage of your turnover

See our [T&C's](https://manage.boothbook.com/terms-conditions) for more information

Trusted all over the world
--------------------------

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is in GBP and excludes VAT for UK customers. Free unlimited trial is available.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Complete business management for small businesses.
